thread.section_title: Hotel du Continent - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: PERFECT BOUTIQUE HOTEL
thread.title_full: PERFECT BOUTIQUE HOTEL - Review of Hotel du Continent, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cyril J
title: PERFECT BOUTIQUE HOTEL
text:
Came back to this hotel twice as I love the comfort and the cleanliness of the rooms. Apart from that, the hotel is centrally located. A street above its street where the hotel is located, is the famous shopping street, St Honore.
The whole experience made me booked this hotel the second time and will definitely patronize this hotel in the future. The front desk staff are cheery and very helpful!
One of the staff even introduced me to a local restaurant called L'adoise! It is located just beside the hotel and the quality of the food is amazing!
